Then police cars and firefighters arrived to deal with the situation.

On December 13, a high school in Shaanxi (published IP) set up a decibel detector in the classroom. If a student coughs, the screen will display "Please be quiet, please be quiet"

content:
On December 14, a B station UP host shared his
According to him, because a QQ group was involved in the dissemination of "terrorist documentaries", and the real-name authentication of one of the QQ accounts had stolen his information, he was taken to the police station and detained, and his voiceprint and fingerprint were recorded, and he was also infected with mycoplasma pneumonia.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 14, Xi Jinping inspected a sugarcane field in Laibin, Guangxi, and touched a sugarcane tree. Currently, this sugarcane field has become a popular check-in attraction for local internet celebrities. People line up to take photos with the sugarcane, and it is rumored that the charge has reached 20 yuan per time.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, due to wage arrears, the cleaning ladies of Northeast Petroleum University went on strike, resulting in garbage piling up in the dormitories.
Three days later, the school announced that it would hire students to clean the dorms for 15 yuan per hour, under the pretext of working and studying, which caused students to complain.
Currently, because no students responded, the school sent teachers to pick up the garbage.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Recently, a Japanese restaurant called "Chinese Queen Mother" posted a notice saying "No Chinese/Koreans allowed in", which prompted many Chinese bloggers to go to the restaurant to negotiate and call the police and shoot videos to post on domestic platforms.
The incident sparked widespread heated discussions inside and outside the Great Firewall, and some bloggers later said that the Chinese Embassy had intervened, which led to the closure of the store.
On December 15, the store reopened and removed the slogan at the door, but replaced it with "8964" and "Winnie the Pooh" and support for "Hong Kong independence".

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Netizens explain why Beijing Metro is losing money: A large number of security personnel account for 30% of the subway's daily revenue, it would be strange if it didn't lose money

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 13, Sixi Town, Taishun County, Wenzhou City.
A man posted a message saying that his 3-year-old son was abused by a full-time teacher at the Sixi Town Hand in Hand Kindergarten. The child was covered with nail marks from head to toe, some of which had scabbed over. The school responded that the person involved was not a teacher, but a childcare worker, and the kindergarten is currently waiting for the results of the public security agency's investigation.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 14, a netizen posted a video saying that she applied for the front desk position at Nanjing Maqun Meiyu Hotel on Boss Direct. When discussing the salary and vacation, the HR mentioned that "security guards have one day off a month, and the front desk staff has one." The netizen then asked, "What about the Chinese New Year vacation?" The HR said, "There should be vacation during the Chinese New Year. Please find a company that gives you unlimited vacation," and insulted her.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 15, the official media released the results of the Beijing subway rear-end collision. A total of 515 people were sent to the hospital for examination, including 102 people with fractures, and no one died. As of 6 a.m. this morning, 423 people have been discharged from the hospital, 25 people are under observation, and 67 are hospitalized for treatment.
According to preliminary investigations, the cause of the accident was that the track slipped in the snow, causing the signal of the front car to degrade, and the emergency brake stopped. The rear car was located in a downhill section, and the snow caused the train to slide, and failed to brake effectively, causing a rear-end collision with the front car.
In response, Hu Xitui said: "It is not ruled out that other serious safety accidents are quietly approaching. I hope I am wrong."

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: Last night, at Jishuitan Hospital

content: December 15, Beijing. The day after the rear-end collision on the Changping Line, no one dared to stand at the junction of carriages even when the subway was crowded during the morning rush hour.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: A few days ago, a netizen complained that if Metro Line 13 is not repaired, it is really afraid that it will break into two parts.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
On December 15, the media reported that the company involved in the "Rat Head Duck Neck" incident in Nanchang, Jiangxi was fined 100,000 yuan, and the illegal income of 1,325.5 yuan was confiscated. The three responsible persons, Zhu Moumou, Tao Moumou, and Yi Moumou, were fined 10 times, 9 times, and 8 times their income last year, respectively, totaling 7.06 million yuan.
However, netizens have been asking how Director Jiang of the Nanchang High-tech Zone Market Supervision and Administration Bureau, who lied at the time, should be punished.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: On December 15, some netizens at the scene recalled the rear-end collision on the Changping Line of the Beijing Metro last night, but were accused by netizens of spreading negative energy

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content: December 15, Linyi, Shandong. The Xiyuetai construction site in Qiaojiahu Village owes workers last year's wages, and the problem has not been solved yet. The helpless workers slept on the floor in the corridor of the Linyi Municipal Government's Wage Arrears Office to demand their wages and defend their rights.

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
December 14, Xiangyang Primary School, Changbai Korean Autonomous County, Jilin Province.
A parent of a student broke into the classroom and ordered his child to beat another classmate. In the video, he can be heard telling the child to "beat him", and the two staff members at the scene did not stop him.

All cars can pass, but Tesla cannot.
